member.name: CXAPOParametersBase.BeginProcess
member.returns: Returns a pointer to the current process parameters.

member.name: CXAPOParametersBase.CXAPOParametersBase
member.summary: Creates an instance of the CXAPOParametersBase class.
member.param: A pointer to an structure that contains the registration properties for the XAPO.
Pointer to three contiguous process parameter blocks used for synchronization.
Size of a parameter block in pParameterBlocks.
If TRUE, indicates produces data to be returned by and disallows calls to .

member.name: CXAPOParametersBase.EndProcess
member.summary: Notifies CXAPOParametersBase that the XAPO has finished accessing the current process parameters.

member.name: CXAPOParametersBase.OnSetParameters
member.summary: Called by to allow for user-defined parameter validation.

member.name: CXAPOParametersBase.ParametersChanged
member.summary: Indicates if has been called since the last processing pass.
member.returns: Returns TRUE if has been called since the last processing pass. May only be used within the XAPO's implementation, before is called.
